Name: Might
Desc: Increases the number of ATK Add-on drops.

Name: Constitution
Desc: Increases the conversion rate of HP, DEF, and duplicate Add-ons.

Name: Perception
Desc: Reduces enemy resistance and increases the drop rate of Simulation Crystal Flux

Name: Knowledge
Desc: Increases Elemental DMG, CRIT DMG, and the amount of Hyper gained.
